"/ci2 1 Tia Begin":
"Hey soldier, why don't you fight before you start showing off your bathing suit?
…..ahem. I'm in a bit of trouble here, can you come help me will you. "

"What's with the title of soldier…….
Anyway, thank you very much. "

"I'm sorry……..
The problem clearly lies in us, or rather a certain pretty soldier. "

"…….excuse me, this is my limit.
The pretty solder will sort out the rest of it……."

"Oh dear, this is because you've been folling around with this pretty soldier business!
Take a bit of a break, Pati. "
